description: This dataset includes all public meetings that were posted to the Transparency website by State of Oregon agencies, boards, commissions and ESD's from January 1. 2013 through December 31, 2013.  The meetings are sorted by name of agency, board, commission or ESD.

metadata.description: This dataset includes all public meetings that were posted to the Transparency website by State of Oregon agencies, boards, commissions and ESD's from January 1. 2013 through December 31, 2013.  The meetings are sorted by name of agency, board, commission or ESD.

name: Archived 2013 Oregon Public Meetings
